column2: You are big kid now. It's time to become an adult and get your first initiation ritual done
I will finally become a man!
May the gods be with me
It is a day of your initiation. Today you will get your skin scared to make it look like skin of great Pukpuk.
Your ritual went without bigger complications and your skin finally looks like skin of great pukpuk. You have officialy became a man!
Your skin reacted badly to the ritual cutting and you get an infection. However if you you survive it your skin will look like skin of great Pukpuk.
